official_title: A bill to amend title VII of the Civil Service Reform Act of 1978 and to affirm the right of federal employees subject to that act to be represented, for purposes of labor-management relations, by representatives of their own choosing.

summary.text: Amends the Civil Service Reform Act of 1978 to declare that Federal employees have the right to be represented by representatives of their own choosing in labor-management relations. Eliminates current requirements that such a representative be recognized or certified as the exclusive representatives of employees.
